text:
@CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters The European Union has 4000 new cases of #COVID19 each day -- almost under control.  The U.S. has 24,000 new cases every day.  Either Americans are eager to die or they're incredibly stupid, because they still aren't trying to stop the virus.  Led by 
Let's-All-Die-Now Trump.
